s1.title: Advanced Threading Utilities
s1.p: Avalon Excalibur's concurrency management utilities are in the org.apache.avalon.excalibur.concurrent package. They give you important thread handling classes like Lock (a Mutex implementation), DjikstraSemaphore, ThreadBarrier, and ConditionalEvent.
